name: Avko Labs
tag_list: mobile-games, mobile-applications, ios, ipad, iphone, blackberry, windows-phone, windows-mobile, ios-mobile-development
overview:
Avkolabs is a full-service mobile game and application development company, which specializes in designing and developing custom products on iOs, Android, Blackberry and Windows Phone platforms.

We have put together a team of highly qualified mobile enthusiasts who focus on client interaction and guide you through every stage of the development process. We provide comprehensive strategy, design, development and maintenance service at affordable price.

Our team puts as much emphasis on our client relations and communication as we do on our technical proficiency. We specialize in creating both games and apps with a broad range of functionality including but not limited to 2d and 3d graphics, in-app purchase, maps, multimedia, mobile networking, promo integration and user activity tracking, streaming data.

We are ready to offer our clients solutions to their most challenging tasks and demonstrate the results that will increase their profit.

Ready to discuss your idea - give us a call at +1 (305) 600 034 or send a message - skype: avkolabs; e-mail: info@avkolabs.com.
